title: Login fails when I open Thunderbird
content: I get this message when I open Thunderbird. "Sending of password for user jhtimmons@embarqmail.com did not succeed. Mail server pop.centurylink.net responded: service temporarily unavailable."
creator: john.h.timmons.jr

title: I can't send or receive emails
content: I'm very confused. I've been using Thunderbird as my email server for a few years. Recently, I stopped receiving emails December 12, 2023. I sent in a problem according to the help page that I found. I believe Mozilla is now the server for Thunderbird? I don't even know if that is accurate (part of my confusion). I followed prompts and confirmed my email address, apparently I now have a user name. I still can't send or receive emails. Can you help. I need step-by-step instructions, please.
creator: karen108

title: Mozilla support request 123325
content:
My Thunderbird has not worked properly since Dec. 11. It receives only a few of the many messages that I should have received. Also, I am unable to send emails. Thunderbird responds with messages like these: Sending of the message failed. Unable to authenticate to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.googlemail.com. Please check the password and verify the 'Authentication method' in 'Account Settings | Outgoing server (SMTP)'. The STAT command did not succeed. Error getting message number and sizes. Mail server pop.gmail.com responded: [AUTH] invalid credentials.

I can provide more details if requested.
creator: Mysterfied

title: Error in Yahoo.com account setup
content: while adding the yahoo.com account in thunderbird. It's picking up the AOL account not the yahoo.com account. Please let me know how to fix it
creator: pachisiya.praveen

title: lapp non funziona
content: ogni tanto l'app non riesce a spedire e mi chiede di rimettere la password per il mio indirizzio e mail su smpt2.sunrise.ch ma anche se la metto non funziona e non mi invia le mail, altre volte inviva ma non salvava in posta inviata.inoltre non salva in rubrica tutti gli indirizzi.che fare? Posso disinstallare e riinstallare? é davvero disagevole e mi causa problemi e mi fa perdere tanto tempo grazie Rosa Maria govoni
creator: rmgovoni

title: "Enter Password" box no longer comes up when I start up Thunderbird so can't access new emails
content: "Enter Password" box no longer comes up when I start up Thunderbird. One account has password saved but the other doesn't so I cannot access emails on this account now as they won't download without either a saved password or (as I usually do) entering a password. This affects my husband also so not just something on my account. This happened around the 20th December. I've searched through Thunderbird settings but I can't find any way of adding a password directly into Password Manager - only edit or delete. So I can't fix the problem we now both have with accessing new emails. So - any suggestions please or is there a fix coming?, kind regards
creator: mary.therese

title: Wątkowanie w Thunderbird
content:
Jak na stałe wyłączyć wątkowanie w Thunderbird?

Widok->sortuj wg->niepowątkowane pomaga tylko na chwilę. Przy odświerzeniu poczty ponownie jest aktywne wątkowanie.
creator: kw.staffservice

title: Trouble downloading new messages
content: Why won't Thunderbird won't download new messages? I can get to them in Web Advisor through my email client's webpage, but not using the Thunderbird app.
creator: tgodfrey

title: Tabs not restoring and top menu bar is gone.
content:
Updated to 115.6.0 on Gentoo linux.

Now my tabs do not restore when I restart and the top menu bar is gone.

I downgraded to 115.5.1 to see if that fixed it and I'm getting the same results.

I have deleted the session.json file and that has not helped. Additionally thunderbird is not creating a session.json file any more. When I close thunderbird then look for the file in my directory it's not there.

Suggestions? Thank you.
creator: webmaila

title: Some folders (e.g. 'All Mail on ebailey@phillipslaw.net') cannot be compacted because there is not enough free disk space. Please delete some files and try again.
content: Everytime I open thunderbird it gives me this message 3 or 4 times: Some folders (e.g. 'All Mail on ebailey@phillipslaw.net') cannot be compacted because there is not enough free disk space. Please delete some files and try again. I have deleted thousands of emails and it still sends this message
creator: ebailey

title: Thunderbird pop password failure
content:
I can send emails just fine, but cannot receive any. After a few moments, I get a popup saying my login to the mail server failed, and I can retry, enter new password, or cancel. When I click on Enter New Password, nothing happens. No new dialog box appears. Retry just keeps repeating the same error.

This issue arose when I changed my password on the webserver, and then attempted to update my password in TB under Privacy and Security/Saved Passwords, but only the smtp server is listed. I must have deleted the pop address. I don't see a way to add it back. Other than removing the account and creating a new one, is there a way to add the pop address? Many thanks.
creator: mark_gory

title: Donate
content: I was about to donate to Mozilla as I am a long time user of Thunderbird. Do to my computer being hacked and entire password file stolen I've decided when placing any charges to my credit card I use a generated virtual card number. The app that generates the number is an extension in my Chrome browser. I've used this app before when making purchases; The app auto generates a virtual number and can send the required information to the vendors credit card purchasing page. However, I tried this when donating to Mozilla and the popup locks me out of the virtual number app so that I can't "send" the information over to the Donation popup. I don't use G-PAY, PayPal or any other third party processor. Maybe Mozilla doesn't allow the use of virtual credit card numbers. Anyway, my intention was to donate. Any suggestions that will allow me to use my preferred payment method?
creator: bgkent
